bookSourceComment:
by天天的鸟蛋蛋
阅读云（sososhu）搜索系列+1

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##手机直接访问.*|记不住网址.*【小说虎】

ruleSearch.author: span@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if (result.match(/阅读云/)) {
   u = baseUrl.split(',')[0]
   cookie.removeCookie(u)
   // java.startBrowserAwait(u, "验证")
   java.webView(null, u, "document.cookie")
   ck = cookie.getCookie(u)
   head = JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'Cookie': ck } })
   url = u + "," + head
   result = java.ajax(url)
}
result
</js>
.block > div > div:nth-child(n+1)
ruleSearch.name: a@text

searchUrl:
https://www.sososhu.com/?site=mxshbook&q={{key}},{
  "headers": { "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; PACM00 Build/QP1A.190711.020) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.5359.79 Mobile Safari/537.36" }}

loginUrl:
<js>
function login(){
	email = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("邮箱");
	pwd = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
	url = "https://api.unifans.io/account/login";
	body = {
          "boundMailbox": String(email),
          "password": String(pwd)
         }
	post = {
		"method":"POST",
		"body":JSON.stringify(body)
		   }
	url = url+","+JSON.stringify(post);
	token = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data.token;
	authorization = "hgq "+token;
 authorization = {
 	"authorization":String(authorization)
 	}	; 
 	source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(authorization));
	}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: $.data.collection.nickName
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
if(/getPersonalInfo/.test(baseUrl)){
	result =java.getString("$.data.description")+`\n-----复制下面文字粘贴至发现地址-----\n{{$.data.homeName}}::data:getPersonalInfo;base64,{\{java.base64Encode("domainName={{$.data.domainName}}&_t="+Date.now())}\},{"type":""}`
	}else{
		result = java.getString("$.data.collection.comment")
		}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.data.collection.name

ruleContent.content:
if(/data:postId/.test(baseUrl)){ postid = java.hexDecodeToString(result) result = JSON.parse(book.customVariable)[postid]; }else if(/getCollectionDetail/.test(baseUrl)){ if(book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index){ url = "https://api.unifans.io/creator/getCollectionDetail?collectionId={{$.data.collection._id}}&_t="+Date.now(); title = "{{$.data.collection.name}}"; url = "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+encodeURIComponent(url); html = ` 《${title}》加入书架
《${title}》
简介：${java.getString("$.data.collection.comment")}
加入书架
`; script = `data:text/html;charset=utf-8,${encodeURIComponent(html)}`; java.startBrowser(script,"《"+title+"》") } result="❗️刷新本章节，跳转本书详情页\n"+'简介：'+java.getString("$.data.collection.comment")+"\n"+'' }else if(/getOne/.test(baseUrl)){ result = String(book.intro).replace(/img src/g,' ##\

ruleExplore.author: $.creatorName
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if(/localhost/.test(baseUrl)){
	
let list = [];

domid = java.hexDecodeToString(result);

		合集链接 = "https://api.unifans.io/common/getCollections?"+domid;
		
	合集 = 	String(java.ajax(合集链接));
	java.setContent(合集);
	list = java.getElements("$.data.collections[*]").toArray();

		主页链接 = "https://api.unifans.io/creator/posts?"+domid+"&skip=0&limit=1000&order=1";
	主页 = 	String(java.ajax(主页链接));
		java.setContent(主页);
		主页list = java.getElements("$.data.posts[*]").toArray().sort((a, b) => {
    const hasAName = a.collectionDetails[0]?.name != null;
    const hasBName = b.collectionDetails[0]?.name != null;
    return hasAName - hasBName ;
});
		list = list.concat(主页list)
	result = list.length?JSON.stringify(list):`[{name:"无内容"}]`;
	}
	result
</js>
$.data.posts[*]||$.[*]
ruleExplore.name: {{$.name||$.title}}

ruleToc.chapterList: let list; function putContent(list){ let json = {} for(i in list){ text = String(java.getString("$.text",list[i])).replace(/<\/*span.*?>| style=".*?"/g,'').replace(/{{HOST}\}/g,'https://bucket-prod.unifans.io'); img =String(java.getString("$..address",list[i])).split('\n').map(x=>'').join("\n"); html = text+"\n"+img.replace(/ a.createTime - b.createTime); putContent(list) result = list.length?JSON.stringify(list):`[{name:"无目录"}]` }else if(/getPersonalInfo/.test(baseUrl)){ domid = java.hexDecodeToString(result); 合集链接 = "https://api.unifans.io/common/getCollections?"+domid+"&_t={{Date.now()}}"; 合集 = String(java.ajax(合集链接)); java.setContent(合集); list = java.getElements("$.data.collections[*]").toArray(); 主页链接 = "https://api.unifans.io/creator/posts?"+domid+"&skip=0&limit=1000&order=1&_t={{Date.now()}}" 主页 = String(java.ajax(主页链接)); java.setContent(主页); 主页list = java.getElements("$.data.posts[*]").toArray().sort((a, b) => { const getName = (item) => item.collectionDetails?.[0]?.name ?? null; const nameA = getName(a); const nameB = getName(b); if (nameA === null && nameB !== null) return -1; if (nameA !== null && nameB === null) return 1; // 按 createTime 升序排列（旧的在前） return a.createTime - b.createTime; }); putContent(主页list) list = list.concat(主页list) result = list.length?JSON.stringify(list):`[{name:"无内容"}]` }else if(/getOne/.test(baseUrl)){ result = `[{name:"${book.name}"}]` } $.[*]
ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
if(/getPersonalInfo/.test(baseUrl)){
if(String(java.getString("$.name"))!==""){
				result = "https://api.unifans.io/creator/getCollectionDetail?collectionId={{$._id}}&_t="+Date.now();
		}else if(String(java.getString("$.title"))!==""){
				result = `data:postId;base64,${java.base64Encode("{{$.postId}}")},{"type":""}`;
			}
}	else if(/getPostsByCollection/.test(baseUrl)){
	result = `data:postId;base64,${java.base64Encode("{{$.postId}}")},{"type":"unifansContent"}`;
	}
</js>

bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "COPY/999.9.9",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  { name: "账号：", type: "text" },
  { name: "密码：", type: "password" },

    type: "button",
    action: "Login()",
    style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 1}
  },
  { name: "查看当前", type: "button", action: "look(0)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "查看历史", type: "button", action: "look(1)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },

  { name: "繁体搜索", type: "button", action: "search_TC()", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "繁简转换", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "目录整理", type: "button", action: "settle()", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },

  { name: "༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻", type: "button", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 1} },
  { name: "①热辣漫画❶", type: "button", action: "$(1)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45} },
  { name: "②热辣漫画❷", type: "button", action: "$(2)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45} },
  { name: "③热辣漫画❸", type: "button", action: "$(3)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45} },
  { name: "④热辣漫画❹", type: "button", action: "$(4)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45} },
  { name: "⑤热辣漫画❺", type: "button", action: "$(5)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45} },
  { name: "⑥热辣漫画❻", type: "button", action: "$(6)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45} },
  { name: "⑦热辣漫画❼", type: "button", action: "$(7)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45} },
  { name: "⑧热辣漫画❽", type: "button", action: "$(8)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45} },

  { name: "༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换分类  ɞ´«ˇ༻", type: "button", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 1} },
  { name: "全部", type: "button", action: "o(0)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "日本", type: "button", action: "o(1)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "韩国", type: "button", action: "o(2)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "欧美", type: "button", action: "o(3)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "完结", type: "button", action: "o(4)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },
  { name: "", type: "button", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.25} },

  { name: "༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换排序  ɞ´«ˇ༻", type: "button", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 1} },
  { name: "热门人气", type: "button", action: "p(0)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45} },
  { name: "更新时间", type: "button", action: "p(1)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45} },

  { name: "页数：", type: "text" },

  {
    name: "清除网站Cookie缓存",
    type: "button",
    action: "deleteCookie()",
    style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 1}
  },

  { name: "清除远程代码标识", type: "button", action: "DeleteYckey()", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 1} },

  {
    name: "💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()",
    style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 1}
  }
]

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url=String(result.match(/(http.*.m3u8)","u/)[1]).replace(/\\/g,'');
java.log(url);
if(book.durChapterIndex==chapter.index){
java.startBrowser(url,chapter.title)
java.toast('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待')
}
t=java.get("t")
img=java.get("img")
' \n\n【刷新正文】或【点击章节链接】跳转播放\n🔗直链:\n'+url+'\n'+t+img
</js>

ruleExplore.name: tag.span@text

ruleSearch.author: class.w-full@tag.p.4@text&&class.w-full@tag.p.5@text
ruleSearch.name: class.w-full@tag.p.0@text

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
sourceUrl='https://cooingc.cc/'
java.log(baseUrl)
let result = java.getElement('tag.button').toString();
const startIndex = result.indexOf("href='/");
const endIndex = result.indexOf("/'");
const endUrl = result.substring(startIndex+7, endIndex);
java.log(endUrl)
url=sourceUrl+endUrl+'/'
java.log(url)
</js>

ruleContent.content: .chapter-image@data-original data = result.split('\n').filter(url => url.trim() !== '');imgTags = data.map(item => ``) .join('\n'); imgTags;

bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "COPY/999.9.9",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>

  { name: "②拷贝漫画❷", type: "button", action: "$(2)", style: {layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45} },
